original_text: And the Lord sent against him bands of the Chaldees, and bands of the Syrians, and bands of the Moabites, and bands of the children of Ammon, and sent them against Judah to destroy it, according to the word of the Lord, which he spake by his servants the prophets.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그의 종 선지자들을 통하여 하신 말씀과 같이 갈대아의 부대와 아람의 부대와 모압의 부대와 암몬 자손의 부대를 여호야김에게로 보내 유다를 쳐 멸하려 하시니

sentences.original_text: And the Lord sent against him bands of the Chaldees
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 주께서 그를 대적하여 갈대아인들의 부대를 보내시고

sentences.original_text: and bands of the children of Ammon
and sent them against Judah to destroy it
according to the word of the Lord
which he spake by his servants the prophets
sentences.korean_translation: 그 말씀은 그가 그의 종 선지자들을 통해 말씀하신 것이라
